name: com.unity.formats.fbx
description:
The Unity FBX Exporter package makes it easy to send geometry and animation to any application that supports FBX and back again with minimal effort.

In particular, this round-trip workflow enables you to export Unity scenes to FBX, import into Maya, Maya LT, or 3ds Max using an artist-friendly interface, export Unity-ready FBX geometry and animation, and safely merge your changes back into those Assets to continue your work.

For more information, see the FBX Exporter package documentation.
